Package index

Simulation

Functions for simulating stock paths

sim_gbm()
Simulate Geometric Brownian Motion
sim_heston()
Simulate Heston Model
sim_svjd()
Simulate Stochastic Volatility with Jumps (SVJD)

Pricing & Risk Neutralization

Option pricing and risk neutral transformation

price_european_option()
Price European Option via Monte Carlo
generate_risk_neutral_paths()
Generate Risk-Neutral Paths via Residual Resampling
fit_arima_returns()
Fit ARIMA to Price Paths (Log-Returns)
plot_simulations()
Plot Simulated Paths
